title: Which Corki skin to purchase?
body:
After seeing the Snowdown sales, I had my heart set on getting Red Baron Corki, however I began to question as to whether it is worth buying.

Does the rarity of this skin outweigh the better visual effects of Dragonwing or Urf Rider or would it be better to get more visually appealing skin. I personally like all of the skins, just have trouble choosing.

replies.body: Best to go with the skin you like best...as in the end its what your gonna see for 40 minutes at a time :)
